required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability of Phase II and Phase III Formulations of AZD0530
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Randomised, Open-Label, Cross-Over, Single Centre Study in Healthy Volunteers to Determine the Relative Bioavailability of the Phase III Tablet Formulation to the Phase II Tablet Formulation of AZD0530

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to compare how different formulations of AZD0530 are absorbed by the body. As for all clinical trials, safety and tolerability of the drug will be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: To compare the pharmacokinetic parameters for AZD0530 when administered as Phase III formulation in relation to Phase II formulation.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose sample, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 48, 72, 120, 168 hours post dose samples.

secondary_outcome.measure: To monitor the safety of all subjects by assessment of vital signs, ECG, clinical chemistry, haematology, urinalysis and adverse events.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From time of consent to last visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: An exploratory objective is to characterise the Pharmacokinetic profile of an oral solution of AZD0530 and 4 additional tablet variants of the Phase III formulation of AZD0530
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose sample, 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 48, 72, 120, 168 hours post dose samples.

intervention.description: of both the Phase II and Phase III AZD0530 125mg tablet variants (A and B) in a random order.
Part II: Single doses of AZD0530 125mg oral solution and 2 out of 4 125mg tablet variants (C, D, E and F) in a random order.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Female subjects must be of Non- child-bearing potential
- Body mass index between 19 and 30 kg/m2 and weigh between 50-100 kg
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of any clinically significant illness
- Abnormal vital signs
- History of any conditions that may put the subject at risk by participating in the study
- Participation in another clinical study.

overall_official.affiliation: AstraZeneca, Clinical Pharmacology Unit, Alderley Park

responsible_party.name_title: Mary Stuart, MD, Medical Science Director, Emerging Product Team 1, Oncology
